Title: Provides for the exemption of disabled veterans of the armed forces of the United States from New York state thruway tolls
Summary: Provides for the exemption of disabled veterans of the armed forces of the United States from New York State Thruway tolls.
LawCode: Amd ยง361, Pub Auth L; amd ยง1630, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law and the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to the exemption of disabled veterans from tolls collected by the New York state thruway authority
